content: वलयः --यं [वल्-अयन्] {@--1@} A bracelet, armlet; विहितविशदबिसकिसलयवलया जीवति परमिह तव रतिकलया <ls>Gīt. 6</ls>; <ls>Bk. 3. 22</ls>; <ls>Me. 2</ls>, <ls n="Me.">60</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 21</ls>, <ls n="R. 13.">43.</ls> {@--2@} A ring, coil; <ls>Ś. 1. 33</ls>, <ls n="Ś.">7. 11.</ls> {@--3@} The zone or girdle of a married woman. {@--4@} A circle, circumference (<ab>oft.</ab> at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); भ्रांतभूवलयः <ls>Dk.</ls>; वेलावप्रवलयां (उर्वी) <ls>R. 1. 30</ls>; दिग्वलय <ls>Śi. 9. 8.</ls> {@--5@} An enclosure, a bower; as in लतावलयमंडप. --यः {@--1@} A fence, hedge. {@--2@} A branch. {@--3@} A sore throat. (वलयीकृ ‘to form into a bracelet;’ <ls>Ku. 5. 66</ls>; वलयीभू ‘to serve as a bracelet or girdle’).
